alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 18 at 2:06PM CDT until August 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heat index values of 94 to 100 F expected. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Pine County. In Wisconsin, Burnett County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the St. Croix Band in Burnett County and the Mille Lacs Band, Hinckley and, Lena Lake areas. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 9 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you plan to spend time outside on the water Saturday afternoon and evening. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing and drink plenty of fluids. Take breaks in an air-conditioned building to get out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
